category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 14 (Responsible Partner Management)
contents: Article 14 (Responsible management of partner companies) ① The Sports Council guarantees equal opportunities to all partners and conducts transparent and fair transactions. ② The Sports Council takes care to ensure that human rights violations of stakeholders, including partners, do not occur in relation to business activities. ③ The Sports Council informs various stakeholders of the Sports Council's human rights management policy and supports and cooperates for its implementation. [Moved from Article 9, previous Article 14 moved to Article 9 2019. 11. 7.]
